text: The Year of the Hare may refer to: * The Year of the Hare (novel), a 1975 Finnish novel * The Year of the Hare (film), a 1977 Finnish drama based on the novel The Year of the Hare * Le Lièvre de Vatanen, a 2006 French film based on the novel The Year of the Hare * "Year of the Hare" (song), a 2015 single by the Canadian band Fucked Up ==See also== * Chinese zodiac * Chinese calendar
title: The Year of the Hare
